wikipedia_page.main: Robert McBride (1856–26 November 1934) was a unionist politician in Northern Ireland.

response: | style="background:#FFD0FF" valign=top |Robert McBride (Unionist) 25 April 1934 – 26 November 1934 (died); Robert Perceval-Maxwell (Unionist) from 7 January 1935
At the 1929 Northern Ireland general election, Robert McBride was elected unopposed.
